content: Democrats don’t trash the system like republicans do; Democrats believe in the system and ply it according to accepted rules, practices, and norms. republicans ruthlessly manipulate the system to their personal greed-infested ends. republicans plain old do not believe in fairness — they think it’s for suckers. This has no chance because republicans are well aware that on a fair and level playing field they lose every time. They are the party of the 1% — period.
